headline: AMD Announces Press Conference at Computex 2025
summary: AMD @ Computex 2025 AMD @ Computex 2025 SANTA CLARA, Calif., April 23, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- AMD (NASDAQ: AMD) today announced that it will be hosting a press conference during Computex 2025. The in-person and livestreamed press conference will take place on Wednesday, May 21, 2025, at 11 a.m. UTC+8, Taipei, at the Grand Hyatt, Taipei. The event will showcase the advancements AMD has driven with AI in gaming, PCs and professional workloads. AMD senior vice president and general manager of the
